name: Pinkalicious: Its Party Time
overview: Welcome to Pinkville! Join Pinkalicious and her friends to help plan some totally pinkerrific parties! Explore Pinkville with Pinkalicious while planning for Pinkatastic parties! * Make Cookies, Cupcakes, Lollipops, Pink Lemonade, and more * 17 Different characters from the Pinkalicious series of books * 15 different Pinkalicious parties to plan
